com.simsilica.lemur.RangedValueModel

    com.simsilica.lemur  

    • Uses of RangedValueModel in com.simsilica.lemur

      Classes in com.simsilica.lemur that implement RangedValueModel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultRangedValueModel
      A default implementation of the RangedValueModel interface that keeps a value and a version, incrementing the version whenever the value changes.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
